name: OSpace
description:
OSpace, a game based on breaking circles and avoiding asteroids, levels designed to be associated with music, to give you a sense of rhythm.

this game is designed to push your skills in limit. you need to fly through all the circles to complete the level in high rank ("S" Rank) .

You can also design your own level including your own music with your own difficulty (depending on how you designed this level), and share it globally to allow others to play your level.
you can Also customize your spaceship shape and color and trail.

CREDITS

Developed by SaturnGames ( https://twitter.com/SaturnDevR).

Support Us

Patreon Page (https://www.patreon.com/user?u=32734078).

Note: The game is still in production. creating levels and share it online is not supported in this version.

Download the beta-Test version . and send us a feedback.

if you like it . don't forget to support us to finish the game as soon as possible.

DOWNLOAD TIPS

You need WinRAR or 7Zip to extract the downloaded game files. 

Once you extracted the files with one of these programs, find and open the extracted folder and run the executable file found inside to run the game.
